org.ensembl.driver
Interface QtlAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface QtlAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Retrieves Qtls from the database. Works in conjunction with the QtlFeatureAdaptor.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
See Also:
Qtl, QtlFeatureAdaptor

fetch

public Qtl fetch(long internalID)
          throws AdaptorException
Fetch Qtl by it's internalID.

Returns:

AdaptorException

Parameters:

fetchBySourceDatabase

public java.util.List fetchBySourceDatabase(java.lang.String sourceDatabaseName,
                                            java.lang.String sourceID)
                                     throws AdaptorException
Fetch all Qtls from database that originally come from the specified database and have the specified id.

Parameters:
sourceDatabaseName - name of the source database.
sourceID - id in the source database.
Returns:
list of zero or more Qtls matching the criteria.
Throws:
AdaptorException
